scripts.dev: npm run build && serverless offline start --stage local
scripts.dev:admin: npm run build && serverless offline start --stage local --config serverless-admin.yml
scripts.migrate:dry-run: REGION=us-east-1 S3_BUCKET=memory-game-images-dev THEMES_TABLE=memory-game-api-themes-dev DRY_RUN=true INTERACTIVE=true ts-node scripts/compress-existing-images.ts
scripts.migrate:dry-run-all: REGION=us-east-1 S3_BUCKET=memory-game-images-dev THEMES_TABLE=memory-game-api-themes-dev DRY_RUN=true INTERACTIVE=false ts-node scripts/compress-existing-images.ts
scripts.migrate:compress: REGION=us-east-1 S3_BUCKET=memory-game-images-dev THEMES_TABLE=memory-game-api-themes-dev DRY_RUN=false INTERACTIVE=true ts-node scripts/compress-existing-images.ts
scripts.migrate:compress-all: REGION=us-east-1 S3_BUCKET=memory-game-images-dev THEMES_TABLE=memory-game-api-themes-dev DRY_RUN=false INTERACTIVE=false ts-node scripts/compress-existing-images.ts
